attributes.action:
Trade deals with Donald Trump?!? 

UK needs a choice to rejoin the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK deserves, as a human right to reassess the situation since Donald Trump has been elected as Presedent in the U.S 
We need truth and honesty.. In our country and abroad.
Please back us and sign this petition for your Children. 
By separating ourselves from Europe we are only going to make this situation worse, especially with limited countries to trade with.
Please sign and share this petition.
Let’s show the World & the EU we are better than Donald Trump.
The World is too small for hiding
attributes.background:
The United Kingdom will soon be highly dependent more than ever on American trade deals with.... Donald Trumps USA ?! Who we have blatantly seen to be sexist racist homophobic lying manipulative & wanting to dictate..
I and all my friends and colleagues now think a second EU referendum is needed!!!
